nodes.text: The T-8 disruptor was a model of disruptor used by the Galactic Empire. In the year 4 BBY,[source?] Tseebo, an Imperial Information Office worker, used his AJ^6 cyborg construct to steal the then-new T-8's specifications before defecting to the rebellion.

The T-8 disruptor was first mentioned in "Empire Day," the sixth episode of the canon animated series Star Wars Rebels' first season, which was first released on demand on November 10, 2014 and made its broadcast debut the following week on Disney XD on November 17, 2014.
